name: Triangle (itch) (Tirezor)
description:
Indie Sandbox with a procedurally generated terrain and building mechanic. There is not much in the Alpha 0.1 version, but the project is under development and updates will be released...

WASD/Arrows - Walking;

Spacebar - Jump;

Mouse control - View;

Left mouse button - Destroy;

The right mouse button - Place;

0/1/2/3/4/5 - Change a building object;

R/F/E - Rotate an object;
